# Tables for other analyses

## Marginal hypotheses for effect modification

```{r}
targets::tar_load(
  dplyr::matches("marginal_hypothesis_(\\d)SA$"),
  store = store
)
```

```{r hypothesis-1}
#| label: tbl-hypothesis-1
#| tbl-cap: Pairwise differences between sex-specific marginal contrasts for the effect of \acr{edcs} on \acr{hitrtse} (HELIX Study; 2013-2016).

tidy_res_meffects(
  df = marginal_hypothesis_1SA,
  sa_var = "e3sex",
  outcome = NULL,
  which_res = "hypothesis",
  num_digits_est = num_digits_est,
  num_digits_sig = num_digits_sig
)$table
```

```{r hypothesis-2}
#| label: tbl-hypothesis-2
#| tbl-cap: Pairwise differences between sex-specific marginal contrasts for the effect of \acr{edcs} on the glucocorticosteroids (HELIX Study; 2013-2016).

```
